choices.child-full: Child header block (with featured image & intro block)

fields.label: Banner Form / Contact Link
fields.name: banner_cta_form_contact
fields.instructions: Add link to contact page. Text will not appear if this field is left blank.

fields.label: Banner Foreground Image
fields.name: banner_foreground_image
fields.instructions: If no foreground image is selected, only a background image will appear.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: contact_button_text
fields.instructions: If left blank, no button will display.

fields.label: Phone Link
fields.name: cta_phone_link
fields.instructions: Add the phone number here with no spaces or extra characters (ex. 6141234567)

choices.left: 2 column - map left, copy block right
choices.right: 2 column - copy block left, map right

fields.label: Directions Link
fields.name: map_directions_link
fields.instructions: If left blank, this will not appear in the content block.

fields.label: Phone Link
fields.name: map_phone_link
fields.instructions: Add the phone number here with no spaces or extra characters (ex. 6141234567)

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: resources_button_text
fields.instructions: If left blank, no button will display.

fields.label: Button Link
fields.name: resources_button_link
fields.instructions: If left blank, no button will display.

fields.label: Button Text
fields.name: button_text
fields.instructions: This field is optional. If left blank, no button will appear.

fields.label: Video Embed Code
fields.name: video_embed_code
fields.instructions: Copy the video ID into this field. ex: vimeo.com/showcase/8592426/embed ex: youtube.com/watch?v=Q0Il4Sh9TQQ

choices.bio: Include bio snippet (if selected, excerpt will be pulled from body copy)
